text: I'm a digital director of Career
Colleges trust and we work with young
people particularly those that the
education system have let down I work
very closely with AWS and it started off
because of the skills shortage so how do
we develop those skills so that you
don't have that skill shortage it then
became how can we develop young people
not necessarily just with cloud skills
but how can we make them career ready so
we're developing with Amazon a program
that allows young people to almost dip
in if you like at any stage but is a is
a process and a pathway for them we do a
digital skills for girls who we work
with girls particularly because it's
such a shortage of women in our industry
to try and find a way of getting them to
understand that actually it's a really
exciting an exciting place of work so
it's very much about trying to introduce
them to the concepts of digital also
around things like AI and virtual
reality and all the things unfortunately
that many stop don't know about so can't
teach and these are digital staff it has
to change
you
